fn.p: Competing Interests: The authors have declared that no competing interests exist. J.G. Pinto is supported by the AXA Research Fund, which is the scientific philanthropy initiative of the insurance company AXA. The AXA Research Fund enables 100% freedom of research and has no commercial or exploitation ownership of the performed research, so there are no competing interests (for more information please see https://www.axa-research.org/). This does not alter our adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
